description: Blow the mind of your guests with this Blizzard cocktail recipe. Blizzard cocktails are a popular dessert during the&nbsp;summer months, but it can be challenging to find good recipes. Here is one that you'll want to bookmark for next year!
name: The Blizzard
recipeIngredient: Lemon slices and cranberries for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: Combine all the ingredients in a cocktail shaker and fill with a handful of ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine all the ingredients in a cocktail shaker and fill with a handful of ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain to glass and add ice. Garnish and serve.
